channel.title: Error running the Source
channel.description:
So, I get this error when I run the source:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/842/unledarh.png/][IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/9823/unledarh.png[/img][/URL]
Help please, if you can!

item.title: Error running the Source
item.dc:creator: @Im_Not_Beast Im Not Beast
item.description:
@Im_Not_Beast wrote:

Thanks guys. Got it fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Error running the Source
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

omg… all of you just stop. It has to do with your item.cfg you added an “” which shouldn’t be there.

Read full topic

item.title: Error running the Source
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:10, topic:412684”][quote author=JokesOnYou link=topic=514162.msg3731948#msg3731948 date=1314667734]

Your item prices configuration (or simply item configuration) has a syntax error.

Probably due to a poor reading method not recognizing your whitespaces.
[/quote]It could actually be anything, something wrong with your files, or just simply edit the Run.bat, you will never know untill you try something

Did you even read the error, doyouknowjaba? Java has the most straight forward errors I’ve ever seen.[/quote]Thanks for proving my point… They just post half ass things… tires me out.

Read full topic

item.title: Error running the Source
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

[quote=“RsInFecTion, post:11, topic:412684”][quote author=Coelho link=topic=514162.msg3731971#msg3731971 date=1314668176]

Your item prices configuration (or simply item configuration) has a syntax error.

Probably due to a poor reading method not recognizing your whitespaces.
[/quote]It could actually be anything, something wrong with your files, or just simply edit the Run.bat, you will never know untill you try something

Did you even read the error? doyouknowjaba?

jaba? Doyouknowhowtospell?[/quote]
You obviously didn’t realize I meant to make that mistake, herpaderp.

Read full topic

item.title: Error running the Source
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“JokesOnYou, post:7, topic:412684”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=514162.msg3731953#msg3731953 date=1314667866]

[quote author=Coelho link=topic=514162.msg3731937#msg3731937 date=1314667581]
Your item prices configuration (or simply item configuration) has a syntax error.

Probably due to a poor reading method not recognizing your whitespaces.
[/quote]OT: This is probably true. If it is a PI base look in data.cfg check all the .cfg files for errors. The mistake is basicly using the space bar instead of Tab which you should use. [quote author=RsInFecTion link=topic=514162.msg3731931#msg3731931 date=1314667483]
What did u edit before u got this error?
[/quote]STOP POST FARMING!!![quote author=JokesOnYou link=topic=514162.msg3731911#msg3731911 date=1314667199]
That happens alot to a bunch of people you have to edit the information in run.bat
[/quote]STOP POST FARMING!!!
[/quote]First of all im not post farming ok? so dont say i am im actually helping[/quote]You guys post on every single post together. Half of them are half assed comments claiming you “know the fix.” Just post if you know the fix. If you don’t just don’t post… common sense.

Read full topic
